description: Phase 9: Responsive & Mobile Polish - Ensuring full responsiveness for Admin Dashboard and Public Pages.

userStories.title: Responsive Sidebar & Navigation
userStories.description: As a mobile user, I want to navigate the app without the desktop sidebar taking up the whole screen.
acceptanceCriteria: Implement mobile hamburger menu trigger in AdminHeader
Sidebar should slide in/out or be hidden on screens < 768px
Ensure top header layout adjusts for mobile
npm run typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
userStories.notes: Verified via code review and typecheck. Browser verification skipped per user instruction.

userStories.title: Mobile Dashboard Layout
userStories.description: As a mobile user, I want to see key metrics and charts without horizontal scrolling.
acceptanceCriteria: Update standard grid classes to utilize 'grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4'
Stack Dashboard cards vertically on mobile
Ensure padding is 'p-4' on mobile vs 'p-8' on desktop
npm run typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
userStories.notes: Grid updated to stack on mobile. Padding adjusted.

userStories.title: Responsive Data Tables
userStories.description: As a mobile user, I want to view data tables without breaking the layout.
acceptanceCriteria: Wrap all Tables in 'overflow-x-auto' container
Adjust table cell padding for mobile if needed
Ensure action columns stick or scroll correctly
npm run typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
userStories.notes: Added overflow-x-auto and min-width to tables.

userStories.title: Product Detail Mobile Optimization
userStories.description: As a mobile user, I want to edit products and view details on my phone.
acceptanceCriteria: Update Product Detail grid to 'grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-3'
Ensure sticky sidebars become static stacking blocks on mobile
Adjust 'ProductForm' gap and field widths for mobile
npm run typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
userStories.notes: Stacked layout implemented. Sticky removed on mobile.

userStories.title: Mobile Modals & Overlays
userStories.description: As a mobile user, I want modals to fit on my screen.
acceptanceCriteria: Update Modal max-width classes to be responsive (e.g. 'w-[95vw] md:max-w-md')
Ensure max-height handles mobile spacing (e.g. 'max-h-[80vh]')
Fix backdrop blur on mobile
npm run typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
userStories.notes: Updated modal widths in Orders and ProductVariants.

userStories.title: Touch Targets & Typography
userStories.description: As a mobile user, I want buttons to be easily tappable.
acceptanceCriteria: Ensure 'px-4 py-2' is standard for buttons
Adjust H1 ('text-3xl' -> 'text-2xl') for mobile
Reduce header padding on mobile
npm run typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
userStories.notes: Confirmed standard button sizes and header typography adjustments.
